oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bealer Smotherman
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of Bealer Smotherman. He graduated from Middle Tennessee State Teachers College in 1933 and later became an Aerospace faculty member. He was honored as a distinguished alumni in 1973.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Smotherman, Bealer; Aerospace engineering--Study and teaching; College teachers; Middle Tennessee State University
